title: RADS Error
body: I just got a new computer with Windows 10 installed. I Installed LoL with no problem but when I try to launch the game it gives me RADS Error. I've read everything in the forum about it and tried everything but nothing seems to work.

replies.body: Grats on your new rig!  Not to worry, this error is usually a result of a security setting that's blocking game files from loading.  You'll want to run through the steps of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to fix that up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
I did every step there and it doesnt seem to help.

Aw, bummer.  Thanks for trying!  In this case, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team will help individually.  Download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well, and attach the files they provide to your ticket for more context.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
